name: The Dream Machine
description: Feelings on Elpis V and its fantasies sour following the incident with the hologram. Many have begun to question the price paid for these fantasies or how they are actually crafted. It's time to awaken the galaxy to the truth of Elpis V!
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Zimmerman, Barclay, Lefler, Innovators or Luau Q will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Zimmerman, Barclay, Lefler, Innovators or Luau Q
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Rurigan
featured_crew.flavor: Male Yaderan who lived on Yadera Prime until it was conquered. Then he created a holographic recreation of his lost village.

action.name: And How Do You Plan To Do That?

featured_crew.name: Barclay
featured_crew.flavor: Barclay is thrilled at the opportunity to meet the inventor of the warp drive himself, Zefram Cochrane.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

action.name: I'm Going To Get This One

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

action.name: And How Do You Plan To Do That?

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

action.name: And How Do You Plan To Do That?

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

adventures.description: Bring a gift to the Q avatar in hopes of an audience.

adventures.description: Collect samples of items created to grant visitors' wishes.

adventures.description: Unlock the secrets of Elpis V's miracles!

rewards.name: Barclay
rewards.flavor: Barclay is thrilled at the opportunity to meet the inventor of the warp drive himself, Zefram Cochrane.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Help those lost in fantasy with the Hirogen.
Unlock the secrets of Elpis V with Section 31.

screens.text: "A world where fantasies become reality? Sounds like somewhere I'd like to visit. But if manifesting those fantasies means treating holograms as if they're disposable...maybe it's a darker place than we'd like to imagine."
"Though I don't know that your sympathy is entirely warranted, it certainly seems there's more to Elpis V than the carefree image they wish to project."
"Curious, too, is how they manage it all. Planet-wide holo emitters? Some sort of photonic field? I'm certainly curious. And I'm sure you are too, aren't you, Captain? Let us know what you learn."

"A world where fantasies become reality? Sounds like somewhere I'd like to visit. But if manifesting those fantasies means treating holograms as if they're disposable...maybe it's a darker place than we'd like to imagine."
"Though I don't know that your sympathy is entirely warranted, it certainly seems there's more to Elpis V than the carefree image they wish to project."
"Curious, too, is how they manage it all. Planet-wide holo emitters? Some sort of photonic field? I'm certainly curious. And I'm sure you are too, aren't you, Captain? Let us know what you learn."

"A world where fantasies become reality? Sounds like somewhere I'd like to visit. But if manifesting those fantasies means treating holograms as if they're disposable...maybe it's a darker place than we'd like to imagine."
"Though I don't know that your sympathy is entirely warranted, it certainly seems there's more to Elpis V than the carefree image they wish to project."
"Curious, too, is how they manage it all. Planet-wide holo emitters? Some sort of photonic field? I'm certainly curious. And I'm sure you are too, aren't you, Captain? Let us know what you learn."
"That was an...interesting choice of fantasy, Captain. Let no one say you lack imagination."
"Speaking of imagination, you managed to bring back some fascinating data, Captain. How curious that the fantasies are all originating from a machine built to bring dreams to reality."

responses.text: "A machine that fulfills fantasy? But how? Who controls it?"
"I could think of a few factions I don't want getting their hands on that machine."

screens.text: "It at least makes more sense than the manipulative Q benevolently granting wishes. But a dream machine? Who built it? The idea of a machine just crafted to grant wishes is both enticing and concerning."
"Good questions that I too would like the answers to. How many interesting answers could the origin of that machine yield? Perhaps we might find a way to design a machine of our own."
"I trust you aren't referring to us, of course. But yes. I for example would prefer that Species 8472 not come into possession of the machine."

"Maybe. But what's the cost here? Of anyone, maybe it's ironic for me to be saying this. But I know that dreams and fantasies aren't just granted out of thin air.  What does the one who runs this machine want?"
"It's time to stop operating in the realm of fantasy ourselves. Let's find out what's going here."
"That was an...interesting choice of fantasy, Captain. Let no one say you lack imagination."
